Vfc^CABINETOPERATIONS IN THE MIDDLE east note by the Secretary of the cabinet a daily situation report is being prepared in theMinistry of Defence Information Room for circulation to membersof the Cabinet and the three Service Ministers. These reports will normally be circulated on the 8. 00 a. m. Cabinet distribution. Theyare for the personal information of the Minister concerned.2. The Information Room has been established in thebasement of the Ministry of Defence (Room No. 3) where maps andplots of operations can be seen. Members of the Cabinet and theService Ministers will be admitted at any time. Ministers should,however, be warned that they may be asked to show evidence of identification to the security guards.C.(58) 15717th July, 1958(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office, S.W.I.17th July, 1958
